mapper.select: SELECT * FROM saleledger ORDER BY ldgr_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saleledger ( ldgr_no, ldgr_date, total_amount, condition, order_no, note ) VALUES ( ( SELECT NVL(MAX(ldgr_no),0)+1 FROM saleledger ), To_date(#{ldgr_date},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{total_amount}, #{condition}, #{order_no}, #{note} )
